Aggregate Replicates

Aggregate Replicates

# S4 method for bcbioSingleCell
aggregateReplicates(object)

Arguments

object

Object.

See also

Other Data Management Utilities: filterCells, readCellTypeMarkersFile, subsetPerSample

Examples

load(system.file(
    file.path("extdata", "bcb.rda"),
    package = "bcbioSingleCell"))

# bcbioSingleCell
print(bcb)
#> class: bcbioSingleCell 
#> dim: 1000 500 
#> metadata(33): version pipeline ... devtoolsSessionInfo subset
#> assays(1): assay
#> rownames(1000): ENSG00000000457 ENSG00000002586 ... ENSG00000283957
#>   ENSG00000284526
#> rowData names(11): ensgene symbol ... seqCoordSystem entrez
#> colnames(500): run1_AGAGGATA_AAACACTA_CTTAGGTA
#>   run1_AGAGGATA_AAACACTA_CTTCGATT ... run2_AGAGGATA_TGTTATCA_ACGCAGAG
#>   run2_AGAGGATA_TGTTATCA_CAAGTCAT
#> colData names(7): nUMI nGene ... mitoRatio nCount
aggregateReplicates(bcb)
#> New sample IDs: M1
#> Remapping cellular barcodes to aggregate sample IDs
#> Aggregating counts
#> Aggregating raw cellular barcode counts
#> Calculating barcode metrics
#> 286 cellular barcodes detected
#> 13 mitochondrial genes detected
#> 286 cellular barcodes passed pre-filtering (100%)
#> Updating metadata
#> Preparing aggregated bcbioSingleCell object
#> class: bcbioSingleCell 
#> dim: 1000 286 
#> metadata(34): version pipeline ... subset aggregateReplicates
#> assays(1): assay
#> rownames(1000): ENSG00000000457 ENSG00000002586 ... ENSG00000283957
#>   ENSG00000284526
#> rowData names(11): ensgene symbol ... seqCoordSystem entrez
#> colnames(286): M1_AAACACTA_CTTAGGTA M1_AAACACTA_CTTCGATT ...
#>   M1_TGTTATCA_ACGCAGAG M1_TGTTATCA_CAAGTCAT
#> colData names(7): nUMI nGene ... mitoRatio nCount
